Search for 'X-Men' on Amazon

Cover Date: Annual 1992
Cover Price: US $ 2.25

Issue Tagline: None.

Format: Color; Prestige Format; 64 pages

There are other versions of this issue in the database:
X-Men (1991) Annual 01 Direct Edition

Story Arc(s):    Add/remove story arcs to this issue
Shattershot

Synopsis:
None entered.

Reprinted/Collected in:
Marvel Deluxe - Patrulla - X (2011) #3
Serval (1989) #32
Top BD (1983) #30

Notes:
Includes diagrams of the X-Mansion and the Blackbird, as well as pinups by Tom Grummett & Bob Wiacek; Andy Kubert; Sam Kieth; Mark Texiera; Greg Capullo & Al Milgrom; Jeff Johnson & Bob Wiacek; Mike Mignola; Tom Raney; and Jim Lee.
